solution_line_template: The third level has {third_level_books} books because {top_level_books} / {level_ratio} = <<{top_level_books}/{level_ratio}={third_level_books}>>{third_level_books}
The second level has {second_level_books} books because {third_level_books} / {level_ratio} = <<{third_level_books}/{level_ratio}={second_level_books}>>{second_level_books}
The first level has {first_level_books} books because {second_level_books} / {level_ratio} = <<{second_level_books}/{level_ratio}={first_level_books}>>{first_level_books}

In total there are {total_books} books because {top_level_books} + {third_level_books} + {second_level_books} + {first_level_books} = <<{top_level_books}+{third_level_books}+{second_level_books}+{first_level_books}={total_books}>>{total_books}
